entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
